Name: Solaris Rift
About the game: Deep in the darkest rim of Solaris Rift, humanity has colonized the alien worlds belonging to the darker forces of the system. The beings that were conquered have risen up and begun to launch their assault on the human race. Humanity is in shambles as the system has swallowed their home world and led them to nomadic colonies on numerous worlds of the Rift. Reclaim your home from the Queen of the Everlasting Brambles and her legion. Solaris Rift is a roguelike card game featuring variable encounters, sci-fi narrative, and strategic gameplay. Face off against the terrifying storm drones of the Satex Army, the saboteurs of the gang known as the RogueStars, and the venomous vinelings of the Queen of Thorns. Embark on a journey to save the galaxy from the forces against it. Features Over 50 unique cards More than 12 card mechanics 3 encounters, including a boss fight Multiple player/enemy decks per encounter About Development This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.
